Sentencas: Hydrazine is a promising fuel for portable fuel cells because it is a liquid, it is carbon free and it has a high energy density.
Titulo: Hydrazine as efficient fuel for low-temperature SOFC through ex-situ catalytic decomposition with high selectivity toward hydrogen

Sentencas: In this work, hydrazine was investigated as an efficient fuel for low temperature solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with a traditional nickel anode.
Titulo: Hydrazine as efficient fuel for low-temperature SOFC through ex-situ catalytic decomposition with high selectivity toward hydrogen

Sentencas: A catalytic system with high selectivity toward hydrogen was developed using Ba0.5Sr0.5-Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) as the main catalyst and potassium hydroxide as the promoter.
Titulo: Hydrazine as efficient fuel for low-temperature SOFC through ex-situ catalytic decomposition with high selectivity toward hydrogen

Sentencas: The result of compositional analysis of the products showed that the hydrazine can be decomposed into hydrogen and nitrogen with 100% selectivity when an appropriate amount of KOH promoter is used.
Titulo: Hydrazine as efficient fuel for low-temperature SOFC through ex-situ catalytic decomposition with high selectivity toward hydrogen

Sentencas: Acceptable power densities were achieved for a thin-film samaria-doped ceria (SDC) electrolyte cell operating on hydrazine decomposition products and hydrogen over a complete operation temperature range of 650-450 degrees C.
Titulo: Hydrazine as efficient fuel for low-temperature SOFC through ex-situ catalytic decomposition with high selectivity toward hydrogen

Sentencas: In addition, a similar cell with ammonia as the fuel displayed a much lower performance.
Titulo: Hydrazine as efficient fuel for low-temperature SOFC through ex-situ catalytic decomposition with high selectivity toward hydrogen
Hydrazine as efficient fuel for low-temperature SOFC through ex-situ catalytic decomposition with high selectivity toward hydrogen
